name: Smorshing Good Time
description:
Smorshing Good Time is a test game I edited in the Game Guru engine as a test to see if I could recreate something similar to an asset flip recently released on Steam.

The base demo is called "The Asylum"

If you are interested, here's my video covering the asset flip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tHF4euZg9bY

The game will not be officially released obviously.

Hail Smorsh.

- Patty
